headline: Kalshi reveals insider trading case against editor for MrBeast

script.veo3_visual_prompt: Medium shot of DETECTIVE MILLER (40s, weary eyes, slightly rumpled suit, loose tie) pinching the bridge of his nose, seated at a bland beige conference table. Across from him, MARTHA (50s, severe bun, crisp blazer, stern expression) points a laser pen at a large projection screen showing abstract market charts. CHAD (20s, intense, earnest expression, wearing a black MrBeast logo hoodie) sits rigidly. Sterile office lighting. 9:16 vertical portrait aspect ratio.
script.dialogue:
Martha: (authoritative) Your trades violated market integrity.
Chad: (indignant) I just knew the shark video would hit.
Miller: (weary sigh) 'Shark video.'
script.audio_cues: Subtle hum of fluorescent lights, quiet click of a laser pen.

script.veo3_visual_prompt: Close-up on a projection screen displaying a vibrant line graph titled 'Predicting "Billionaire For a Day" Views' with a dramatic, exaggerated spike. Behind it, CHAD'S face (intense, focused, partially obscured) is lit by the screen's glow. DETECTIVE MILLER'S left hand (resting on a stack of official-looking papers) slowly covers his eyes in growing disbelief. Bright, corporate lighting. 9:16 vertical portrait aspect ratio.
script.dialogue:
Chad: (defensive) Early access. The script mentioned jet skis.
Martha: (stern) You knew the exact number of jet skis.
Miller: (muffled) Jet skis...
script.audio_cues: Sharp 'ping' sound effect as a point on the graph spikes. Slight paper rustle.

script.veo3_visual_prompt: Low angle shot of a large, clear evidence bag containing a single, slightly deflated, red rubber duck. A small 'EVIDENCE' tag hangs from the bag. In the foreground, DETECTIVE MILLER'S face (expressionless, eyes vacant, staring deadpan at the duck) is prominent. MARTHA (smug, self-satisfied smile) stands proudly beside the evidence. CHAD (arms crossed, beaming with pride) is partially visible in the background. Harsh fluorescent office lighting. 9:16 vertical portrait aspect ratio.
script.dialogue:
Martha: (triumphant) Your illegal profits, Mr. Editor.
Chad: (beaming) Bought me 500 new rubber ducks!
Miller: (flat, dead inside) The ducks...
script.audio_cues: Silence. Distant, faint siren fades out. A single, small squeak of a rubber duck.
